item.title: Measuring maximum sustained transaction throughput on a global network of Bitcoin nodes
item.description: Andrew Stone, Bitcoin Unlimited We are 25 minutes behind schedule. We have the rest of the team wathcing remotely. I think the motivation for this project is clear. Transaction volume on the bitcoin network could be growing exponentially except that there is a limit on the number of confirmed transactions. Transaction fees have increased and confirmation times are not reliable, and bitcoin is unusable for some applications. Some people want to see the max blokc size limit lifted.
